sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-list>
    <v-list-group
      v-for="group in groups"
      :key="group.id"
      v-model="group.active"
      :prepend-icon="group.icon"
      no-action
      :sub-group="group.users.length > 1"
      :sub-group-items="group.users"
      sub-group-label="ユーザー"
    >
      <template v-slot:activator>
        {{ group.calendar.name }}
      </template>
      <template v-slot:sub-group>
        <v-list-item v-for="(user, index) in group.users" :key="index">
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-title>{{ user.name }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </template>
    </v-list-group>
  </v-list>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      groups: [
        {
          id: 1,
          calendar: { name: "グループ1", color: "blue" },
          icon: "mdi-account-group",
          active: false,
          users: [
            { name: "ユーザー1", icon: "mdi-account" },
            { name: "ユーザー2", icon: "mdi-account" },
            { name: "ユーザー3", icon: "mdi-account" },
          ],
        },
        {
          id: 2,
          calendar: { name: "グループ2", color: "red" },
          icon: "mdi-account-group",
          active: false,
          users: [{ name: "ユーザー4", icon: "mdi-account" }],
        },
      ],
    };
  },
};
</script>
